players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead on the first night. We should be cautious and make sure we're all working together to identify who among us might be a mafioso."
You: "Let's work together to find the mafia and protect our team."
Diana: "I believe it's important that we all cooperate to find the mafia and keep our team safe. Based on my investigation during Night 1, I have reason to suspect Alice is the mafioso."

Charlie: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems that one of us is a mafioso. I believe it's important that we all cooperate to identify who that might be and keep our team safe. I don't have any concrete evidence yet,..."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob. Let's work together to eliminate the other mafia and protect our team."
